### Checklist

- [ ]  Add thumbnail
- [ ]  Add description
- [ ]  Add other links
- [ ]  Make Chapters on YouTube
- [ ]  Add tags
- [ ]  Add end card (Which video could they watch next?)
- [ ]  Add to playlist
- [ ]  Schedule video
